channel.title: Comments on: The Trip – Day 14 – St. Louis MO, Jerry Seinfeld
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: Amit
item.dc:creator: Amit
item.description:
Eti: Actually I did meet a St. Louis couple... I'll write about them a little in the next post
Ariel: No, I didn't pee in my pants. At least not that I know of :)
item.content:encoded:
Eti: Actually I did meet a St. Louis couple… I’ll write about them a little in the next post

Ariel: No, I didn’t pee in my pants. At least not that I know of :)

item.title: By: Ariel Cohen
item.dc:creator: Ariel Cohen
item.description: At least you didn't pee in your pants. Or did you?
item.content:encoded: At least you didn’t pee in your pants. Or did you?
